products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Plum - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout plum is a fabric that needs no introduction. The vivid colour works in perfect harmony with the subtle flowing texture to create a fabric that lives long in the memory. It's exactly what you need when you're searching for something that will bring your home to life. The next step is to think about complimentary secondary colours that you can use to unify the rest of your interior.

products.title: Konya Blackout Sloe Purple
products.description: Konya blackout sloe purpleplain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade.

products.description: Like a royal cloak the cordoba purple vertical blind is a rich and decadent choice. The deep purple colour will make a statement at the window and coordinate beautifully with other purple, amethyst or plum tones. products.title: Cordoba Blackout Purple Roller Blind
products.description: The deep purple tone here is one of warmth, its a stylish colour somewhere between dark blackcurrant and lighter grape, it has depth but isnt too vibrant or loud. This blackout roller blind will add a sophisticated note to a bedroom or maybe a cosy look in a bathroom.

products.title: Verdi (Blackout), Dusty Plum - Roller Blind
products.description: Take a closer look at verdi (blackout) dusty plum and you'll soon see why it's a fabric that's proving to be a hit with all different styles of modern decor. The deep and moody purple is perfectly tempered by the intricate ornate patterning that shimmers gently in the light. Just what you need when having your home look its best is the only option. Pairing the deep tones of dusty plum with a zesty green or a powdered orange would be an inspired way to work in more natural shades.
